tool_description: Upcoming anime schedule updated as new info becomes available. Sorted by nearest date. Anime characters coming soon. 10 anime per page, around 4-5 pages total.
name: Upcoming Anime
title: Upcoming Anime

api_list.name: Get image
api_list.description: Just send a web request to ImgUrl provided by /anime/{pageNo}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/img/296608.jpg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/img/{image}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get upcoming anime
api_list.description: Gets upcoming anime page by page. pageNo must be specificed, it cannot be 0
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com/anime/{pageno}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upcoming-anime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
